text.title: Alan Rickman dies at 69 due to cancer
text.head: Alan Rickman dies at 69 due to cancer
Sources

list.item: "Alan Rickman, Harry Potter and Die Hard actor, dies aged 69" — BBC News Online , January 14, 2016
Catherine Shoard. "Alan Rickman, giant of British screen and stage, dies at 69" — The Guardian , January 14, 2016
